title: 's Account
loginToProceed: If you have registered with this site please login for the optimal experience click here to log in. If you haven't registered please do so Click here to register an account
pwRules: Passwords must be more than 7 and less than 25 characters in length.  They must contain at least one number, one uppercase, and one lowercase alphabetical character, and may contain special characters.
accountCreationError: Your account could not be created, please check the following:
errorPwNewAndOldMustDiffer: Error: Your new password cannot be the same as your old password.
errorPwEntriesMustMatch: Error: Your new password entries must match.
